switch_flow_increase.description: Rotate the switch to increase water flow.

switch_flow_decrease.description: Rotate the switch to decrease water flow.

press_switch.description: Press the switch for any irregularities.

clean_switch.description: Clean the switch with a wipe to remove any dust or grime.

rotate_switch_to_increase_flow.description: Rotate the switch clockwise to increase the water flow.

rotate_switch_to_decrease_flow.description: Rotate the switch counter-clockwise to decrease the water flow.

initiate_water_flow.description: Check the status of the switch and rotate it if the water flow is not initiated.

maintain_switch.description: Wipe the switch to remove any potential dirt and clean it.

adjust_switch.description: Rotate the switch to adjust the water flow.

status_check_switch.description: Check the status of the switch.

check_switch_status.description: Check the status of the switch

press_and_rotate_switch.description: First press the switch, then rotate to adjust the water flow.

rotate_switch.description: Rotate the switch to control the water flow.

increase_water_flow.description: Rotate the switch to increase the water flow.

decrease_water_flow.description: Rotate the switch to decrease the water flow.

wipe_switch.description: Wipe the switch to clean it.

clean_base.description: Clean the faucet base to maintain it free from grime and dust.

verify_faucet_base.description: Check the status of the faucet base.

clean_and_wipe_faucet_base.description: Clean the faucet base and wipe it to maintain cleanliness.

status_check_faucet_base.description: Check the status of the faucet base to ensure it is in good condition.

maintain_faucet_base_cleanliness.description: Wipe the faucet base regularly to prevent build up of dirt.

maintain_faucet_base.description: Clean the faucet base to maintain its appearance and functionality.

wipe_faucet_base.description: Wipe the faucet base to remove any potential dirt and keep it clean.

clean_faucet_base.description: Clean the faucet base by wiping it.

clean_faucet.description: Clean the entire faucet including switch and base.

check_faucet conditions.description: Check the status of the faucet and press the switch for functionality.

moderate_flow_faucet.description: Adjust the water flow by rotating the switch and clean the entire faucet.

clean_and_check_faucet.description: Clean all parts of the faucet and check its status.

press_and_rotate_switch.description: Press the switch to detect any irregularities, then rotate it for desired water flow.

maintain_whole_faucet.description: Maintain the cleanliness of the whole faucet by wiping it completely.

complete_faucet_inspection.description: Check the status of the faucet, wipe it and rotate the switch to see if it is working properly.

faucet_status_check_and_maintenance.description: Check the status of the faucet and perform cleaning process.

adjust_and_clean_faucet.description: Adjust the switch for preferred water flow and then clean the entire faucet.

full_faucet_management.description: Ensure the faucet is in good status, adjust the water flow if needed and keep it clean.

clean_whole_faucet.description: Thoroughly clean the entire faucet, including the switch and the base.

inspect_and_maintain_faucet.description: Check the status of the switch and the base, then clean the entire faucet.

check_and_press_switch.description: Verify the status of the switch and press it to check its operation.

inspect_and_clean_faucet.description: Check the status of the switch then clean the entire faucet.

clean_switch.description: Clean the switch to remove any residue and ensure proper functioning.

check_and_clean_faucet.description: Rotate the switch to check its functioning, then clean the whole faucet.

full_faucet_cleaning.description: Wipe both the switch and the faucet base for a thorough cleaning.

verify_and_adjust_switch.description: Check the status of the switch, and if necessary, rotate to adjust the water flow.

check_and_clean.description: Check the overall status of the faucet, and then clean both the switch and the faucet base.
